Job Details:
\n
\n
Job Summary:
\n
As a Business Intelligence Solution Analyst within the Operational Excellence & Enterprise Analytics Department, you will be responsible for optimizing and managing our enterprise business intelligence platform (Power BI.) The ideal candidate is passionate about creating exceptional user experiences, implementing robust security frameworks, and enabling stakeholders to leverage analytics effectively. You must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the business intelligence needs of multiple teams across clinical and non-clinical domains. The right candidate will be excited by the prospect of standardizing our organization's BI environment and empowering users through training and optimized analytics solutions.
\n
Responsibilities:
\n
\n
\n
Develop and enforce design standards including color schemes, graphics templates, typography, and layout guidelines to ensure consistency across all enterprise analytics assets.
\n
Perform comprehensive validation of business intelligence solutions to ensure data accuracy, calculation correctness, and alignment with business requirements and definitions.
\n
Design and implement intuitive navigation patterns, bookmarks, and interactive elements that enhance end-user engagement and self-service analytics capabilities.
\n
Configure and manage user access for objects including workspaces, datasets, reports, and dashboards. Implement row-level security (RLS) and object-level permissions aligned with organizational data governance policies.
\n
Monitor and fine-tune report and dashboard performance through DAX optimization, data model refinement, query folding techniques, and efficient visual design.
\n
Develop and deliver training programs for end-users and report developers on functionality, best practices, and self-service analytics capabilities. Create documentation and training materials.
\n
Apply data visualization best practices and visual analytics principles to create clear, compelling, and action-oriented analytics solutions.
\n
Build and maintain front-end analytics tools, dashboards, and reports that provide actionable insights into operational performance and key business metrics.
\n
Collaborate with data engineering teams to ensure optimal data model design and semantic layer implementation that supports scalable BI solutions.
\n
Establish testing protocols and quality assurance processes for BI deliverables prior to production deployment.
\n
Partner with stakeholders including Executive leadership, Operations Management, and departmental teams to understand analytics requirements and provide technical guidance on BI solutions.
\n
Manage service administration tasks including workspace management, gateway configuration, capacity monitoring, and license optimization.
\n
Provide recommendations to enhance BI capabilities, user adoption, and analytics maturity across the organization.
\n
Maintain comprehensive documentation of BI solutions, security configurations, data definitions, and standard operating procedures.
\n

\n

Excellent written and verbal communication with a strong drive for perfection/professionalism in delivery and presentation. Proven ability to work both independently on projects and as part of a larger team.
